column5: Anyone know if there is any free parking and place not to far of a walk out for some perch fishing?
There's limited (very) parking along Lake Drive South and some have been parking on the ice at the foot of Glenwoods.
Jackson Point.  Park down by Bonnie Boats.  Newfie bait shop opens at 6 or 630 (nice folks).  Gazillion minnows for 5 bucks.  Whitefish skunked me out there yesterday.
I should of mentioned that it is just another 10 minute drive or so.
Funny, I have moved to Keswick almost a year now and I have no idea where anything is. Where is Bonnie Boats and is it a fairly short walk to decent perching?
Bonnie Boats is Jacksons Point  at Glenwoods you have lake access, most times lot park on the ice there and on one side of Glenwoods Beach road
